summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1218, for the improvement of Thirty-second Avenue, from East Pike Street to the North line of Albion Heights Addition, all in the City of Seattle, by grading the same, under Ordinance No. 13343 and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
